document_data.name: Akkar Donatus
document_data.mainbody: Father '''Akkar Donatus''' was a [[priest]] of [[Ilmater]] residing in the city of [[Zazesspur]] in [[1370 DR]].In chaper 9 of the novel, ''[[War in Tethyr]]'', [[Zaranda Star]] visits the chapter house located at the [[House of Tears]] and speaks to the arch[[priest]] and chief [[cleric]] there, who is unnamed. If the two characters are the same, then the book would describe Akkar as tall and gaunt, with sad, gray eyes, and fringes of gray hair around a doorknob-shaped head.
document_data.Activities: Daily, Father Akkar led the roughly 60 [[cleric]]s and 200 laypersons in sacred rituals at the [[House of Tears]], a temple to Ilmater and local chapter house for the [[Order of Ilmater's Brethren]].
